author: xtqqczze
body:
The IDE dispose analyzer rules have been deleted from Roslyn:
* IDE0067
* IDE0068
* IDE0069

See: https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/eeba499ecf839ec35bca25062d69d2fc5c4885b9

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
IDE0067: DisposeObjectsBeforeLosingScope can be replaced with [CA2000: Dispose objects before losing scope](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2000).
IDE0069: DisposableFieldsShouldBeDisposed can be replaced with [CA2213: Disposable fields should be disposed](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2213).

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:`v7.2.0-preview.8` has been released which incorporates this pull request.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.0-preview.8)

title: Delete IDE dispose analyzer rules
